Hello,
   I have just started using Junit and am very pleased with it. But
=
one problem is how to organise groups of test classes into suites. In
v3.8 =
it seemed very easy - just make your own class with a static suite()
method=
 and then add your required classes.
But how do you do this in version 4? T=
he only documentation I've found
( in the javadocs)
suggests addin @RunWith=
 annotations to your suite class but I don't
understand what to do, or how =
you specify a list of test classes .
Many thanks for any advice!
